pkgmetadata.longdescription: An 'R' Client for the 'USDA NASS Quick Stats API' // Provides several convenience functions for searching and pulling data from the 'USDA NASS Quick Stats API' https://quickstats.nass.usda.gov/api. Users can easily search for specific data items, and then download county-level or state-level Census of Agricultural data from a specified year.
